scripts.start: yarn codegen && yarn build:local && yarn remove:local && yarn create:local && yarn deploy:local
scripts.deploy:local: graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 seashell-vaults --version-label v0.0.1 --network arbitrum-one
scripts.deploy:goerli: graph deploy --product hosted-service --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ blackholes --version-label v0.0.1 subgraph.yaml --network goerli
scripts.deploy:mainnet: graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ loreum/explorers --version-label v0.0.1 subgraph.yaml --network mainnet
scripts.deploy:studio: graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml && graph deploy --studio loreum-nft --network mainnet
scripts.test:lerna: graph codegen subgraph.yaml && graph build subgraph.yaml && graph test -r
